name: Prospect Park Skate Circle
description: Smooth park loops and the skate circle area near the bandshell. Great for cruising and flat ground tricks.
history: Skaters and rollerbladers have used the park paths for decades. The skate circle is a weekend tradition.
bestTimes: Weekend afternoons for the social scene. Weekdays for peaceful cruising.
transitDirections: B/Q to Prospect Park, 2/3 to Grand Army Plaza.

detailedNotes.terrain: Features include flat ground, smooth paths, gentle slopes. Well-maintained concrete construction.
detailedNotes.culture: Part of the Brooklyn skate scene in Prospect Park. Skaters and rollerbladers have used the park paths for decades. The skate circle is a weekend tradition.
detailedNotes.tips: Best approach: B/Q to Prospect Park, 2/3 to Grand Army Plaza.. Weekend afternoons for the social scene. Weekdays for peaceful cruising.
detailedNotes.warnings: Public skatepark â€” standard park etiquette applies.
